message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its high quality and functionality, it's valued at $100 by many of our customers. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this opportunity to you for $95. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest and ensure you experience the value we promise. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
